items.sentence: You need a longer handle if you want to get more torque.
Tom couldn't open the jar, so Tom asked Mary to open it.
Tom was stealing stuff from the store he was working in.
What you said didn't have anything to do with the issue.
You're not nearly as funny as you seem to think you are.
How did you know that Tom wasn't planning on doing that?
Tom has already been told that he's required to do that.
Can you recommend a reasonably priced bed and breakfast?
Don't you remember what you told me on my last birthday?
I wish that life would go back to the way it used to be.
